channel.title: [pi] Webclient issue please help!
channel.description:
The webclient just turns white and is unable to use. it show the java symbol but just turns white!
[code] <applet name="client" width="765" height="503" archive="http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34440568/client.jar" code="client.class">
<param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx700m">
<param name="server_name" value="Expedition Quinlon">
<param name="detail" value="low">
<param name="ip" value="173.193.223.65">
<param name="port" value="43594">
<param name="background_image" value="http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34440568/background.png"> [/code] this is my html code

item.title: [pi] Webclient issue please help!
item.dc:creator: @deadlygfx deadlygfx
item.description:
@deadlygfx wrote:

sometimes when the webclient goes white, it is because it is fetching the cache and preparing it to download. but that should only take a maximum of 5mins on a 100mb/s connection.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Webclient issue please help!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You must have jarred it wrong then.
